column5: I had an interesting conversation with a large group of family and friends last night about 9/11. I was just curious to see what OFC thinks about the subject now that 8 years have past since the tragedy. Please vote for one of the two options in the poll that you lean more towards.  I would like this thread to remain civil and not be locked due to bickering amongst the members, so please vote in the poll but don't trash the thread.  Thanks.
This thread could be nothing but trash.
there is a documentry about 9-11 from a news reporter it is very interesting you should try and get it to watch you get a whole differrtn side of the american goverment and what goes on
28 views and only 1 vote. Guys, this is an anonymous poll.
And it's done.   This poll isn't going to happen.
Thanks Marty, you beat me to it by mere seconds.
